resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105456</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105456</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207142</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History: Ask a Question</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte: Stellen Sie eine Frage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire : Posez une question</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History: Faça uma pergunta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia: Faccia una domanda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία: Υποβάλτε μια ερώτηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia: Haga una pregunta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">lets students correspond with government historians via email. Historians' names and addresses are listed by expertise with an emphasis towards those researching the national parks, the National Park Service, and American history.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">läßt Kursteilnehmer mit Regierung Historikern 
über email entsprechen. Namen und Adressen der Historiker 
werden durch Sachkenntnis mit einem Hauptgewicht in Richtung zu denen 
ausgedruckt, welche die Nationalparks, den Nationalpark-Service und 
amerikanische Geschichte erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">laisse des étudiants correspondre aux historiens 
de gouvernement par l'intermédiaire de l'email. Les noms et les
adresses des historiens sont énumérés par expertise avec une 
emphase vers ceux qui recherchent les parcs nationaux, le service de 
parc national, et l'histoire américaine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deixa estudantes corresponder com os historians do
governo através do email. Os nomes e os endereços dos 
historians' são alistados pela perícia com uma ênfase para aquelas 
que pesquisam os parques nacionais, o serviço do parque nacional, e o
history americano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lascia gli allievi corrispondere agli storici di 
governo via il email. I nomi e gli indirizzi degli storici sono 
elencati da perizia con un'enfasi verso quelle che ricercano i parchi 
nazionali, il servizio del parco nazionale e la storia americana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αφήνει τους σπουδαστές να αντιστοιχούν με τους 
κυβερνητικούς ιστορικούς μέσω του ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου. 
Τα ονόματα και οι διευθύνσεις των ιστορικών εμφανίζονται 
λίστα από την εξοικείωση με μια έμφαση προς εκείνους που 
ερευνούν τα εθνικά πάρκα, την εθνική υπηρεσία πάρκων, και την 
αμερικανική ιστορία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">deja a estudiantes corresponder con los 
historiadores del gobierno vía el email. Los nombres y los 
direccionamientos de los historiadores son enumerados por la maestría
con un énfasis hacia ésos que investigan los parques nacionales, el 
servicio del parque nacional, y la historia americana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207142</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105456</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/history-ask-a-question</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
